website_summaries.verdict: With three durable, natural loofahs, this set is likely to last a long time and meet numerous exfoliating needs.
pros: Set includes three all-natural loofahs from Egypt that offer long-lasting quality
Provides excellent exfoliation and can be used on nearly any area of the body
Can be trimmed for use on smaller areas
cons: They arrive flat, but do "fluff up" once submerged in water
Surface is rough at first, but usually softens with use

customer_reviews.title: I've been loofing wrong my entire life.
customer_reviews.text: This is a mind-blowing upgrade from the plastic loofahs I've been using all my life. In my search for a natural alternative, I was shocked to find that a "loofah" is an actual thing that grows, and that loofahs are made from loofahs. And it's better in every way. Bigger, sturdier, firmer, more spongier, coarser.. A lot less scrubbing, a simple pass with this O.G. loofah is all you need. I still have the other two of these, maybe I'll save the seeds from those and try planting a loofah. I still can't believe you can grow these.
customer_reviews.author: DrSilverworm

customer_reviews.title: JUST ADD WATER
customer_reviews.text: Arrived flat. Added water and it became this huge scrubby loofah. Absolutely love this. Used it last night in the shower, felt so clean and smooth after. It becomes soft when it’s wet. If you have sensitive skin I do not recommend. It’s on the rougher side. (Pic included to show size, next to a regular loofah).
customer_reviews.author: TriSaraht0ps

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting unknown brown substance
customer_reviews.text: The texture of the loofa is great, but when I was soaking the loofa there were large brown unknown particles inside the loofa. I assumed they were bugs, but i cut one open and i am unsure as to what it is. It might be a big it might be some unknown substance that clumped together to look like a bug. Hopefully I can get my money back. GROSS GROSS GROSS.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great loofa
customer_reviews.text: Love this loofa! Wanted to change from the regular ones to take better care of my skin. Definitely exfoliates more (yet gentle on your lady bits). The sponge also gets to the perfect size after soaking. I felt cleaner and smoother after showering.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best loofah's I've used in many many years Don't need to buy scrub It scrubbed away all the dead skin No more plastic or harsh chemicals Just wish it would come in the cloths packing without the plastic bag inside for environmental concerns Just make sure to soak it for 15 minutes Buying Egyptian organic products is buying the elite
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: It makes my skin sting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these loofahs as an alternative to plastic loofahs. Despite soaking the loofah before use, it is still too rough on my skin. I love loofahs that exfoliate, but this product felt like it was actually creating tears in my skin. I would wash my body (it didn’t feel like a nice, comfortable, exfoliating scrub, but more like sandpaper) and when I rinsed, my skin was stinging in the same way that skin does when you have a paper cut or nick yourself with a razor and then run it under water. It was difficult to create a lather as well. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cal B.

customer_reviews.title: Had seeds, rotting matter, and a horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: 1 out of the 3 loofahs I received had seeds in it along with little black specks of something mushy. It smelled so horrible I had to throw it away. However, the other 2 loofahs I received we’re fine. I liked the packing and how the sponges came in a linen-like drawstring bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Smart way to new and lovely skin
customer_reviews.text: This loofah has really helped my very dry skin. I was wasting my time and money applying great lotions and oils onto old dead skin. The loofah cleared off the dead skin easily and very pleasantly--it feels great!--so now the lotions are softening and protecting my new and lovely skin cells. Gave it as gifts to three very happy friends now!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while back. I really enjoyed using these loofahs. At first, it was a bit too rough for my skin, probably because I’ve been using the plastic bath puffs and they’re not as rough. There’s 3 loofahs in each order so you don’t have to keep ordering all the time. The loofahs are a bit too big for my liking BUT you can easily snip it and shape it however you like.
customer_reviews.author: Suki C.

customer_reviews.title: Dirt/seed growing inside
customer_reviews.text: There are weird pieces of smelly dirt or some sort of seed inside the loofas. Smells horrible, and dirt is embedded deep inside. Can't clean things out or remove
customer_reviews.author: MooRogue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome alternative to plastic loofahs!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I was hesitant about buying this loofah at first because some reviews talked about how rough it is on the skin. Honestly I think it depends on other people’s tolerance because I don’t think it’s that bad. Yes it is rougher than your plastic loofah but if you don’t press too hard while scrubbing it’s not the bad and plus you get used to the feeling, and I feel like it cleans better. It’s also really durable; I’ve been using it for a week now and no signs of falling apart yet, let’s see how long it lasts. I will make sure to update this post.
customer_reviews.author: Renu Bansal

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these loofas for my family and everyone just loves them. They are so perfect because they are softer but still are able to scrub the dead skin off. I received 3 fairly large loofas and a carrying pouch. The pouch was just thrown away because it’s nothing special or useful. I gave my husband and son each a loofa and I kept one. This is such a great deal and loofa. I did see a couple of the stinky black seeds inside 2 of them. I just removed the stinky seeds with some long tweezers and they are fine now. I will definitely order these again!
customer_reviews.author: BeckyT24

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying a natural loofah product. I like it a lot! It has a coarse texture, which is why it probably wouldn't be good for those with sensitive skin, but the loofah is very malleable when wet and feels more like an exfoliation sponge. As per other reviewers, I checked my loofah for little black seeds (this is normal with natural loofah products) but I didn't find any in mine. It suds up well without a lot of soap and my skin feels softer after using it!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Comes wrapped in PLASTIC.
customer_reviews.text: Changing my review after ordering for a second time. I primarily bought these in my search to remove plastic from my life. Second order of these came with the loofahs wrapped separately in plastic. Don't know why all the plastic wrapping this time when last time there wasn't any. Disappointing. ** Original review after first order** Love that they weren't individually wrapped in a ton of plastic and provide a non plastic bag to store the extras in. Love the exfoliation, not too hard, not too soft. Been using it a few weeks now and it's holding up well with no mold or smell. It's been wonderful! I will never go back to plastic puffs.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Look No Further
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself a nature/natural woman. I do not use soap i can’t pronounce, Shea products only. From lotions and then on. I have been looking for a function loofah and this is it! I love it! You can feel this loofah was crafted with love and customer in mind. Unlike the loofahs you will find at your local CVS this one actually holds soap and doesn’t scratch your skin. It’s big enough to cover all parts of your body and gentle enough to get a deep clean to your face. I use the skin scrubbing technique and this loofah gets the job done. If you are looking for a better loofah, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Nishawn

customer_reviews.title: bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural loofah and these seemed to get many positive reviews, however, it had a bad smell that unfortunately never went away after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewSR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Loofahs
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with my purchase! I made a resolution to stop using plastic as much as I possibly could and switching to a natural loofah was an obvious decision. I have used other loofahs and not found them to be as nice as these because they were very dense and hard and never softened up in water. These are just right and I love how they feel when I use them. I like them so much that I bought a bunch more to give as Christmas gifts !
customer_reviews.author: Debahi

customer_reviews.title: Very rough on skin
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an eco friendly replacement for my generic plastic mesh loofah that I usually buy at Target. This arrived small and compact but once soaked in water, ballooned in size. I think this would be good for a weekly exfoliation, but it’s just too rough for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Favorite body scrubber!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s alot bigger than I thought it would be. But that’s a plus! It is rough and hurts a little when you use it on your skin but it is really bearable. Other brands I can’t even use because of how rough they are. This one is awesome. I feel so smooth and clean after using it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Weird brown spots
customer_reviews.text: It comes with 3 but, one of them a roach in it.... the other two were good. I won't return it bc it exfoliates well and I have two extra but, that roach was nasty. This is better than traditional lofa imo. I feel it gets the dead skin off really well.
customer_reviews.author: shanice

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Loofas at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: These are really fabulous, high quality loofahs. They are a good size and feel really great - not scratchy. They have a cloth tie which is great for hanging them to dry between showers/baths. I am very pleased with this purchase and the speed with which they were received. The cloth storage sack is a bonus and a very classy touch. I only recently learned that loofahs come from a plant that looks like a big squash. Exfoliating is very invigorating!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Large exfoliating loufa
customer_reviews.text: Purchased: May2019 Reviewed: July 2019 3*Ok, 4*Good, 5*Great Made in ??? Much more rough than other loufas; which I like. The are very large, quite porous and easily compresses to fit contours.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know I could get this kind of quality in a loofah! I went to the store the other day and they wanted $40 for a small loofah attached to a stick!!! WHAT???? Then I saw these on Amazon and thought I would take a chance. BETTER THAN EXPECTED and the price is incredible for the quality you get! Love them! Will but again as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Black mold
customer_reviews.text: They are nice but it gets “black mold” within two weeks. I have always used natural loofahs and I let it air dry by the window and it still turns black very fast.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Best Scrubby ive ever used in my life
customer_reviews.text: This is the best body sphonge I ever used in my life! I let it soak for 15 min just like instructions said and omg its huge :o It scrubs really good, like it feels your removing skin and at the same time it feels soft right after you scrubed that area. (Scrubing the feet is amazing :D) There is one con which I just fixed myself: the rope shouldve been longer and from both sides, then you can reach the mid of your back.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr M.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Soft, but it still does its job. Have been using it for months now and it is holding up nicely. I ordered a three pack, but my first is still in great condition. When it is wet, it is soft and fluffy, but it is great for scrubbing and exfoliating. I prefer loofahs over man-made sponges, to me they just feel and perform better. This loofah is great and I am absolutely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite loofah yet
customer_reviews.text: Not a very soft loofah as other reviews have said but really good at exfoliating my skin. Not too rough for me at all. It does also soften up as you continue to use it. Maybe if you soak it longer it will soften up a bit more
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Torres

customer_reviews.title: You will NOT be sorry for buying these.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, and nicely packaged & presented to boot. Don't be put off by the flattened size out of the bag; they will puff up to a nice large size after a couple of minutes in water. Exfoliates just enough, not too much or little. Very satisfied, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: About to buy them again!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you pay attention to the instructions. If you don't soak them in water, they're very harsh on your skin at first. If you soak them, they're excellent. Literally about to buy them again and realized I hadn't reviewed them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Weird goey black spots
customer_reviews.text: After soaking the loofah in water for 15 minutes I looked inside it and it was completely filled with these small black spot things. I thought maybe I got a bad batch that wasn't cleaned out well and had seeds but upon further inspection the spots are all goey and it honestly grossed me out quite a bit. I wouldn't feel comfortable scrubbing my skin with these. I recommend not buying these and getting it from somewhere else or maybe just get washcloths instead
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. My bf got this for me since my skin is so sensitive and I would itch like crazy after a shower. It's a bit rough but when I get out of the shower, I am nice and serene. I feel nice and clean when out of the shower without having to scrub too hard. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I used to buy these often from another company, but lately have been hard to find in stores. Discovered these on Amazon in a set of three. I use it a couple times a week in the shower. Skin feels amazingly smooth again, also helps prevent ingrown hairs. Husband even took one to use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my loofahs today and really like the way they came packaged and the quality of the loofahs. Very nice product and great customer service. Received an e-mail today, before they were delivered, about contacting the company if I should have any problems. Now that is the way it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: What it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Loofah shipped pressed flat, after about 5m in warm water it expanded to the original size. This is a bit wider than my previous so it will take a little getting used to but that is hardly a demerit. Starts off nice and coarse, in my experience the loofah fibers will slowly lose their coarseness and need replacing after about a year. Lanyard is handy for hanging it to dry. All in all, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I came in a pack of 3 and the first loaf after soaking and 1 day use it begin smelly moldy. The smell was similar to wet clothes. I trashed it after 3 after days. I wanted to give it another chances especially since the cost. As I soaked the second one I noticed black particles moving. I cut the loaf open and there was a die insect inside of it. ALL went in the trash. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mold after one month
customer_reviews.text: Loofah turned green and moldy after one month of use and air drying in hook of my shower I’ve never had that happen with another loofah I’ve used before. It would get used air dried as normal and suddenly insta mold yuck!! Never again!
customer_reviews.author: MoonflowerMama

customer_reviews.title: Small but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It's about 8in long and is definitely better than the plastic ones you find at Target or Walmart, all though if you have baby or sensitive skin you'll probably think its too rough and cry! They come in a travel bag so once you get it throw it in water and within minutes it will expand.
customer_reviews.author: Serg

customer_reviews.title: They are packaged in a very nice linen bag that could be used for many other ...
customer_reviews.text: These natural sponges arrived very quickly. I was pleasantly surprised by the high quality. They are packaged in a very nice linen bag that could be used for many other things, The sponges were larger than I expected, I loved using my new sponge as it feels very invigorating on my skin. I may give these sponges as a gift, I was very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Prairie chicklet

customer_reviews.title: Not soft
customer_reviews.text: This is item is not soft! But if you are looking to take the dead cells off your body this is the perfect item. I enjoy how clean i feel after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Scrub a dub dub
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in February and I am still using the same one. It hasnt fallen apart. Its gotten softer with time. I will buy again when I finally go thru all three
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Best bath exfoliant out there
customer_reviews.text: The best loufah / exfoliant out there. These ones are much better than non egyptian loufahs in that they are more gentle on the skin. The 3 loufahs in my package werr cut from different parts of the vegetable (2 ends and a middle) and so have slightly different grains which gives more options for different needs/skin areas.
customer_reviews.author: NooNoo

customer_reviews.title: Real loofah
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for! They are real! They soften when you get them wet, but have enough texture for great exfoliation!
customer_reviews.author: bkkeepr67

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy.
customer_reviews.text: It is probably the softest loofah I have used. It has a fabric loop so you don’t drop it in the shower. These were definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Budster

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner. Packaging was a surprise. Nice container. Helpful instructions included. I would recommend this product to family members and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice package
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my skin feels after using, this loofa. The 3 pack is great, I’m not sure how long they last , I’ll get back to hat question . For now very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyone1

customer_reviews.title: Too rough
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know it’s because I just started using it. It’s very rough on my skin. It’s uncomfortable to use. If it’s getting soft as using I’ll come back and give more stars.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Large sponge exfoliates skin clean feel with every bath
customer_reviews.author: MOD

customer_reviews.title: TOO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: Way too soft. Exactly the opposite of what you are looking for in a loofah. Forget about reducing calluses or dry skin with this.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Best Loofa I've found in the U.S.
customer_reviews.text: I grew up using loofahs, but have found the quality of Middle Eastern loofahs impossible to find in the U.S., which are usually imported from China. These remind me of the ones I grew up with: just the right amount of softness, flexibility, and roughness to make you feel clean and scrubbed, but not scraped raw. I will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Nell1788

customer_reviews.title: Saying no to plastic waste
customer_reviews.text: We switched to natural loofa to replace plastic bath scrubbies.. slowly doing our part to reduce the plastic waste going out into the environment
customer_reviews.author: Anna Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good scrubbers!
customer_reviews.text: Good scrubs and super fun to watch grow! They dry fast, which is a plus. A pretty hard scrub- which we like.
customer_reviews.author: xoxojordan

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't review products but I will weigh in on this one. I have been a loofah user forever. For some reason it has recently become impossible to find loofahs. Plastic puffs and now charcoal puffs and mitts dominate. I turned to Crafts of Egypt on Amazon to get loofah. Many complaints about flatness. I find this product totally fine. They puff up by reconstituting in water. They do flatten a lot when in use but totally do the job as needed. As it is an organic product there is much variability in each vegetable. I will be ordering again. Crafts of Egypt really seem to care about customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Loofah for her skin. After our loofah needed to be replaced, I bought several other similar products that were not loofah. None of them work as good as the real thing. Delivery was fast and the product is as expected. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliating for sure
customer_reviews.text: Expected something softer. This is pretty rough on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More for exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I misread what this would be for. It’s not very luxurious at all even after soaking . I guess it’s good if you want something that will exfoliate . Doesn’t allow for a good lather either .
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and long-lasting, but a bit harsh
customer_reviews.text: These are great products, but you definitely want thick skin to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and quality. I had been using it for a month and the ride is still attached and the sponge is still nice and light in color without any mold
customer_reviews.author: Lana S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: You will never go back to the plastic ones. Works better with soap than with body shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mohamed Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Real ! and The Best Available ! 🤷‍♂️😎
customer_reviews.text: The Only Ones To Buy ! Skip The Junk ! Go With These ! 🤷‍♂️😎
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value! Arrived nicely packaged and pumped when wet. Great addition to the shower routine! With 3, everyone in the family got one!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: All natural, skin softening, wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Once left to sit in the water for about 15 minutes the loofah grew tremendously. It was perfect for exfoliating but did not hurt my sensitive skin. My skin felt super smooth after using for the first time and only felt better every time after that. Loofah arrived in a timely manner and the customer service was wonderful. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard natural loofa. Lasts long and is durable, would recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural exfoliator, and this works well for that. Soft but still lightly exfoliating. Seems like each one will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: elliemay

customer_reviews.title: Your skin will thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never felt so rejuvenated and clean and glowing! Take care of the epidermis, and your epidermis will take care of you. :)
customer_reviews.author: WW

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The description was spot on, and would definitely recommend to prospective buyers. Many Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin, done deal
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. Long lasting and a more environmentally sensitive option, compared to the throw away plastic version. Be sure to soak before hand, removing seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Nati

customer_reviews.title: ROUGH!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a soft loofah and this was not the product to get. Its very rough like sandpaper.... not good for hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Galya

customer_reviews.title: Best loofa
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders! Exfoliation galore and is safe on skin and the environment. Be sure to soak before use. Overall found my new best loofa!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn RImmer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! So glad I found them. They are all natural and way better than a poof.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S Berry

customer_reviews.title: Missing one
customer_reviews.text: The description says: Set of 3 Natural Loofahs/Loofah Sponge - I only got two
customer_reviews.author: Lupita GD.

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs to use these. The exfoliation is AMAZING and worth every penny. Just ordered another set of 3 for the hubby and I
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed - ripped my skin and whatever is in this has made my skin so itchy - threw them out!
customer_reviews.author: Florence C. Trotta

customer_reviews.title: Really nice luxurious product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice luxurious product! I've never seen loofahs so big, so soft and exfoliating, but gentle on moles. They arrive dry and flat but expand in water in a matter of minutes!!! Nicely packed and pretty giftable
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: They smell terrible, I even tried washing them a couple of times and the smell won’t go away, they smell like mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Love the size and feel and value. Ordering more this week. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love these loofahs. The leave me feeling clean. Needs to be run under hot water so it can get puffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Pallavi S

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: Helps to control my psoriasis areas. With this and medicine my skin looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: The best loofa I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Stays remarkably firm even after getting wet. It's a great exfoliant.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The description said set of 3 loofahs and and the picture showed them with little hangers. I only received 1 loofah with no hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This was the best loofah ever
customer_reviews.text: This was the best loofah ever, wet it in warm water about 5 min. It expands and it's soo much better than using a fluffy scrub, its not too hard and you feel very clean. I am definetly buying more for family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: brenda escobar

customer_reviews.title: Skin so soft
customer_reviews.text: Great loofah products. Natural loofah. It dries easily after use. Makes my skin feel smooth and soft after use in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mila

customer_reviews.title: A Real Loofah, A Great Loofah
customer_reviews.text: I love a good loofah and I have found it. This one is durable and easy to clean. It does exactly what it says it will. It makes my bath experience even more pleasurable.
customer_reviews.author: jjohn

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Soft enough on skin but still exfoliating, best sea sponges I’ve ever used! Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Flores

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin smooth and clean
customer_reviews.text: These sponges work so well at scrubbing away dead skin and leaving behind smooth, clean skin. I did some sun damage after being on the water too much this summer. My skin felt dry and bumpy. After a month of using the sponges every day my skin feels great again. I am so glad I found these sponges. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Betty M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than plastic body sponges
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a non-plastic alternative to the body sponges I normally use and honestly these work better and last longer anyway! Love that they have a string for hanging up in the shower too
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Colletti

customer_reviews.title: Good skin care
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. I have used it for scrubing my body every morning. I don't need any soap and the skin is very clean and soft, I think this is very good for my skin health. Usually the really good things are inexpensive and easy to get them.
customer_reviews.author: sue H.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect but should be used sparingly
customer_reviews.text: They’re pretty good. I wanted an alternative to loofas since they fall apart pretty quick. These sponges can be rough and will remove healthy oils from your skin. But they’re perfect for a deep cleaning once every 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Farhad

customer_reviews.title: Guy Sponge works Great
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would change the name of a loofah to a sponge. Works great, not too soft but I can see where women may thinks its a bit harsh. Use 2 or 3 times per week. Holds up great to continuous use, just washout and ring out.
customer_reviews.author: RichDC

customer_reviews.title: Luffs
customer_reviews.text: Quite large, had to cut for hand washing. Once I got cut right. They work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Boone

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy who's not into this kind of stuff, but these are great! Whole family loves them. Make sure to soak them first so they become nice a fluffy
customer_reviews.author: brian davis

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Saving tons of money by not buying the plastic ones. Works well, very durable
customer_reviews.author: Brice E McCain

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliating bonanza
customer_reviews.text: Great exfoliating sponge! I've just started using it so I don't know yet how well it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Melek246

customer_reviews.title: Surprise gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave to wife as a surprise as her old ones had worn out. She uses these regularly & loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: No need to buy another brand.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Works the way its supposed to. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: ymmij

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Comes flat then expands a lot after it gets wet
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Dean

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a real loofah!
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely a great choice if you're looking for a sponge that works and most importantly exfoliates your skin. I used to have the plant back home and that's how I know these are real. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent loofah at great price
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what it said it was. Loofahs well presented and of excellent quality. Size works very well. This is an outstanding product at a great price (I shop around a lot), and I will certainly buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaDoc

customer_reviews.title: Best yet!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I purchased a loofah online on Amazon. I was a little hesitant especially seeing how thin they were in the packaging. But it’s one of the best loofahs ive tried yet!! Felt so good. Definitely buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: great to use, just a little scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to switch from a plastic loofah to natural materials, and I think this is great value for the money. If you have sensitive skin it can be a little scratchy, but I think it softens over time. Good size for scrubbing your whole body and getting an exfoliation!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Bank

customer_reviews.title: Using for dishes
customer_reviews.text: Using instead of a sponge for dishes. Works great and no odor.
customer_reviews.author: Susan T. Zimmerman

product_meta.title: All Natural Loofah Sponge, Set of 3 Real Egyptian Bath & Shower Exfoliating Loofa Scrubber Sponges for Face, Back & Body, Eco Friendly, No Toxic Chemicals, 6" x 6" by Crafts of Egypt
feature_bullets: NATURALLY SAFE & NONTOXIC: Synthetic shower poufs can be loaded with harmful chemicals. But your Crafts Of Egypt luffa sponges are all-natural & eco-friendly with nothing artificial.
SOFTER YET MORE EFFECTIVE: Forget those harsh, scratchy Chinese loofahs. These Egyptian vegan body loofa scrubbers gently buff off dead, dry skin without chafing, reddening, or irritating.
SPA-QUALITY LUXURIES FOR LESS: Why settle for chintzy puffs that quickly fall apart? These 6"x6" body sponges are crafted for lasting use. Pop in the dishwasher to sanitize; then simply hang to dry.
RENEW, REVIVE, REJUVENATE: With their spongy, fibrous texture, your Crafts Of Egypt loofahs help cleanse pores & boost circulation to promote smoother, healthier skin with that youthful radiant glow.
LOVE THEM OR YOUR MONEY BACK: Not totally thrilled with your exfoliating loofah scrubber sponges? Return unused loofas anytime for a full refund or free replacement – your choice. No questions asked.
